ygData.subject: Re: Naggy Raids
ygData.msgSnippet: Have never been on a dragon raid, so I don t know the actualy AOE of the spell, but I would think the AOE damage spell they cast would eat the necros up and if
ygData.messageBody:
Have never been on a dragon raid, so I don't know the actualy AOE of the
spell, but I would think the AOE damage spell they cast would eat the necros
up and if not well the fear running you around would.. Plus 1 summon and
byebye necro and pet... I could be wrong, but I really don't think it would
work.. Hope to go on a dragon raid soon and find out for myself exactly what
the dragons are like.


>From: Kevin Neal <kevin@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Naggy Raids
>Date: Tue, 23 Nov 1999 10:21:08 -0700
>
>:) This would be hard! You should also have a bard in the group to play
>mana song.
>Also an enchanter to tashani, and stun if it isn't resisted. You would
>also have to
>have plenty of FS daggers and a mage to summon his dagger since a pet can't
>duel wield
>two weapons of the same kind.
>
>Manuael
>
>
>
>
>
>
>"Fletcher, Neal L SGT 224 MI BN" wrote:
>
> > From: "Fletcher, Neal L SGT 224 MI BN"
><FletcherNL@...>
> >
> > Actually, they capped the LT at about 5-6 levels above you. Since
>Vox/Naggy
> > are "Officially" lv 53, a necro would have no problem sucking them dry.
>In
> > fact, I have a theory about this. Get 6 lv 50 Necro's with pets, and 6
>lv
> > 50 clerics, and once the giants are taken care of, I think with the
>clerics
> > healing the pets (I'd give them some nice, cheap, fast weapons,
> > bloodclaw's.. etc) the dragons could be taken with only a few deaths.
> >
